20101203020329.571|20101203020331.000|CCO|CLASS.

20101203020348.500|20101203020351.000|CCO|>> THE TIME HAS COME.
20101203020351.000|20101203020353.500|CCO|THE SMOKE SCREEN IS NOW BEING
20101203020353.500|20101203020356.000|CCO|LIFTED BY THIS BILL.

20101203020358.500|20101203020401.000|CCO|BACK DOWN FOR TAX CUTS ON THE
20101203020401.000|20101203020402.667|CCO|MIDDLE INCOME FAMILIES OF OUR
20101203020402.667|20101203020404.333|CCO|COUNTRY.

20101203020417.667|20101203020421.000|CCO|I DON'T SEE ANY CUTS.
20101203020421.000|20101203020422.667|CCO|ALL I SEE IS TAX INCREASES.
20101203020422.667|20101203020424.333|CCO|>> Woodruff:  IN FACT, BOTH
20101203020424.333|20101203020426.000|CCO|SIDES WERE TALKING ABOUT A
20101203020426.000|20101203020427.667|CCO|DEMOCRATIC BILL TO EXTEND SOME
20101203020427.667|20101203020429.333|CCO|OF THE BUSH-ERA TAX CUTS FOR
20101203020429.333|20101203020431.000|CCO|FAMILIES MAKING UNDER $250,000 A
20101203020431.000|20101203020433.000|CCO|YEAR AND INDIVIDUALS WHO EARN
20101203020433.000|20101203020435.000|CCO|$200,000 OR LESS.
20101203020435.000|20101203020437.000|CCO|REPUBLICANS, HOWEVER, HAVE
20101203020437.000|20101203020439.000|CCO|DEMANDED THAT THE CUTS BE

20101203020511.000|20101203020513.500|CCO|MANEUVER GOING ON TODAY AS

20101203020601.000|20101203020603.500|CCO|MEASURE PASSED 234 TO 188.

20101203020611.000|20101203020612.667|CCO|BUT THE BILL IS ALL BUT CERTAIN
20101203020612.667|20101203020614.333|CCO|TO DIE IN THE SENATE, WHERE
20101203020614.333|20101203020616.000|CCO|REPUBLICANS HOLD 42 SEATS ENOUGH

20101203020617.667|20101203020619.333|CCO|FOR DEBATE.

20101203020621.000|20101203020622.667|CCO|McCONNELL:

20101203020624.333|20101203020626.000|CCO|RAISE TAXES WON'T CREATE JOBS.

20101203020632.667|20101203020634.333|CCO|>> Woodruff: ALL THIS TAKES
20101203020634.333|20101203020636.000|CCO|PLACE AS PRESIDENT OBAMA IS
20101203020636.000|20101203020637.667|CCO|FEELING MORE HEAT FROM LIBERAL

20101203020639.333|20101203020641.000|CCO|AGAINST EXTENDING TAX CUTS FOR
20101203020641.000|20101203020646.000|CCO|THE WEALTHY.
20101203020646.000|20101203020651.000|CCO|BUT THE VERY FACT OF PRIVATE
20101203020651.000|20101203020653.500|CCO|NEGOTIATIONS SUGGESTED  THE

20101203020658.500|20101203020701.000|CCO|ALL HE WOULD INDICATE PUBLICLY,

20101203020727.000|20101203020729.000|CCO|AT A TIME WHEN WE ARE

20101203020731.000|20101203020732.429|CCO|>> Woodruff: THE TAX CUTS EXPIRE

20101203021541.000|20101203021542.667|CCO|OF GEORGIA, WHO OPPOSES IT.
20101203021542.667|20101203021544.333|CCO|GENTLEMEN, WELCOME.
20101203021544.333|20101203021546.000|CCO|SENATOR LIEBERMAN, IS IT
20101203021546.000|20101203021547.667|CCO|BASICALLY A CIVIL RIGHTS ISSUE
20101203021547.667|20101203021549.333|CCO|FOR YOU?

20101203021551.000|20101203021552.429|CCO|BUT IT'S ALSO A NATIONAL
20101203021552.429|20101203021553.857|CCO|SECURITY ISSUE.
20101203021553.857|20101203021555.286|CCO|I MEAN, IT'S A CIVIL RIGHTS
20101203021555.286|20101203021556.714|CCO|ISSUE BECAUSE WE MAKE A BASIC

20101203021558.143|20101203021559.571|CCO|YOU'RE GOING TO BE JUDGED NOT BY
20101203021559.571|20101203021601.000|CCO|WHO YOU ARE-- YOUR RACE, YOUR

20101203021602.667|20101203021604.333|CCO|SEXUAL ORIENTATION-- BUT HOW YOU

20101203021606.000|20101203021607.667|CCO|AND "DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL" HAS
20101203021607.667|20101203021609.333|CCO|RESULTED IN
20101203021609.333|20101203021611.000|CCO|14,000 PEOPLE IN OUR MILITARY

20101203023021.000|20101203023023.000|CCO|OTHER INTO THE EARTH'S MANTLE,
20101203023023.000|20101203023025.000|CCO|IT CHANGES THE PRESSURE AND ADDS
20101203023025.000|20101203023027.000|CCO|OCEAN WATER MAKING THE MANTLE
20101203023027.000|20101203023029.000|CCO|MELT.
20101203023029.000|20101203023031.000|CCO|THIS IS WHAT FEEDS VOLCANOES AND
20101203023031.000|20101203023033.000|CCO|EARTHQUAKES AND NO PLACE MORE SO
20101203023033.000|20101203023035.000|CCO|THAN INDONESIA.
20101203023035.000|20101203023037.000|CCO|>> SO, REALLY, ITS A TEST BED OF
20101203023037.000|20101203023039.000|CCO|THE HORRORS THE VOLCANOES CAN
20101203023039.000|20101203023041.000|CCO|BE.

20101203025101.000|20101203025106.000|CCO|INTENTION ON MY PART TO EVADE MY
20101203025106.000|20101203025111.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY, WHETHER IN TAXES
20101203025111.000|20101203025113.000|CCO|OR WHETHER IN FINANCIAL
20101203025113.000|20101203025115.000|CCO|DISCLOSURES.
20101203025115.000|20101203025117.000|CCO|AND THERE'S ABSOLUTELY NO EXCUSE
20101203025117.000|20101203025119.000|CCO|FOR MY OMISSION FOR MY
20101203025119.000|20101203025121.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY TO OBEY THOSE
20101203025121.000|20101203025124.333|CCO|RULES.
20101203025124.333|20101203025127.667|CCO|I TAKE FULL CREDIT FOR THE
20101203025127.667|20101203025131.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY OF THAT.
20101203025131.000|20101203025133.000|CCO|I BROUGHT IT ON MYSELF.
20101203025133.000|20101203025135.000|CCO|BUT I STILL BELIEVE THAT THIS
20101203025135.000|20101203025137.000|CCO|BODY HAS TO BE GUIDED BY
20101203025137.000|20101203025139.000|CCO|FAIRNESS.
20101203025139.000|20101203025141.000|CCO|>> Woodruff: OTHER MEMBERS,
20101203025141.000|20101203025142.667|CCO|INCLUDING NEW YORK REPUBLICAN
20101203025142.667|20101203025144.333|CCO|PETER KING, TRIED BUT FELL SHORT
20101203025144.333|20101203025146.000|CCO|IN A BID TO GIVE RANG AL LESSER
20101203025146.000|20101203025147.667|CCO|PUNISHMENT.
20101203025147.667|20101203025149.333|CCO|>> LET US APPLY THE SAME
20101203025149.333|20101203025151.000|CCO|STANDARD OF JUSTICE TO CHARLIE
20101203025151.000|20101203025152.667|CCO|RANGEL THAT HAS BEEN APPLIED TO
20101203025152.667|20101203025154.333|CCO|EVERYONE ELSE AND WHICH ALL OF
20101203025154.333|20101203025156.000|CCO|US WOULD WANT APPLIED TO
20101203025156.000|20101203025157.667|CCO|OURSELVES.
20101203025157.667|20101203025159.333|CCO|WITH THAT I RESPECTFULLY URGE A
20101203025159.333|20101203025201.000|CCO|VOTE AGAINST CENSURE.
20101203025201.000|20101203025203.000|CCO|>> ON THIS RESOLUTION, THE YAYS
20101203025203.000|20101203025205.000|CCO|ARE 333, THE NAYS ARE 79.
20101203025205.000|20101203025207.000|CCO|>> Woodruff: INSTEAD, THE
20101203025207.000|20101203025209.000|CCO|RECOMMENDATION OF CENSURE PASSED
20101203025209.000|20101203025211.000|CCO|BY A WIDE MARGIN.
20101203025211.000|20101203025213.000|CCO|>> WILL THE GENTLEMAN FROM NEW
20101203025213.000|20101203025215.000|CCO|YORK MR. RANGEL KINDLY APPEAR IN
20101203025215.000|20101203025217.000|CCO|THE WELL?

20101203025219.000|20101203025221.000|CCO|BEFORE HIS PEERS IN THE WELL OF
20101203025221.000|20101203025222.667|CCO|THE HOUSE FLOOR AS SPEAKER NANCY
